column2: "Nkyii so EWURADZE see Job dɛ
column4: "Aso nyia ɔyɛ nyiyiano no ɔnye Otumfo no bɛham? Nyia ɔnye Nyankopɔn gye kyim no

column2: "Nna Job buaa EWURADZE dɛ
column5: musuar; mumbua wo dɛn? Me nsa na medze to m’ano."

column2: "Makasa prɛko
"Nna EWURADZE fi ehum no mu buaa Job dɛ
column4: "Afei bɔ w’asen do dɛ barimba: Mibebisa wo

column2: "Ana ɔwo bogura m’atsɛmbu no so? Ibobu me fɔ
"Anaa ewɔ abasa a ɔtse dɛ Nyankopɔn dze? Na edze ndze a ɔtse dɛ nedze bɔbɔ mu?"
"Afei fa akɛseyɛ na tumdzi hyehyɛ woho; Na fa enyimnyam na ahoɔfɛw kata woho."
"Hue w’ebufuw mbordo no gu: Na hwɛ obiara a ɔyɛ ntsɛn na brɛ no adze."
"Hwɛ obiara a ɔyɛ ntsɛn
column3: na fa no bra famu; Na tsiatsia ndzebɔnyɛfo do wɔ mbrɛ wogyinaa no."

column2: "Fa hɔn bɔ mu suma huntuma mu
column3: Kyekyer hɔn enyim wɔ nsumaa bea no do."

column2: "Nna emi so mebɛka no wo ho Dɛ wankasa wo nsa enyimfa na ɔbɛgye wo."
"Afei hwɛ esuson a meyɛɛ no kaa wo ho no; Odzi efuw dɛ nantwi."
"Afei hwɛ
column4: Na no tum wɔ ne yafun mu ntsin mu."

column2: "Ohim no dua dɛ nkyindur ndua: Ne nserɛ mu ntsin so pempam ho."
"Ne mbiew yɛ dɛ boran a woehun mu; N’akwaa tse dɛ adaban."
"Ɔno nye Nyankopɔn akwan no mu tsitsir: Nyia ɔyɛɛ no no nkotsee na obotum ama n’afona aka no."
"Ampaara mbepɔw fa edziban ma no; Hɔ na hamu mbowadoma nyinara gor."
"Nsoɛndua ase na ɔda
"Nsoɛndua dze no nwinwin kata no do
column3: Esukɔn do ndua bɔ no aprɔw."

column2: "Hwɛ
column4: no ho mmpopo: Sɛ Jordan yir kodu n’ano mpo a

column2: "Aso obi bɛkyer no aber a ɔwɔ atsɛwee no
column3: Anaa wɔdze efir bohwira no hwen mu?"
